00020 #ifndef __CQUEUE_H

00036 typedef int (*CompareFunc)(cObject *a, cObject *b);
00037 
00038 
00056 class SIM_API cQueue : public cOwnedObject
00057 {
00058   private:
00059     struct QElem
00060     {
00061         cObject *obj; // the contained object
00062         QElem *prev;  // element towards the front of the queue
00063         QElem *next;  // element towards the back of the queue
00064     };
00065 
00066   public:
00070     class Iterator
00071     {
00072       private:
00073         QElem *p;
00074 
00075       public:
00081         Iterator(const cQueue& q, bool reverse=false)
00082                 {p=&q ? (reverse ? q.backp : q.frontp) : NULL;}
00083 
00087         void init(const cQueue& q, bool reverse=false)
00088                 {p=&q ? (reverse ? q.backp : q.frontp) : NULL;}
00089 
00093         cObject *operator()()  {return p ? p->obj : NULL;}
00094 
00098         bool end() const   {return (bool)(p==NULL);}
00099 
00106         cObject *operator++(int)  {if (!p) return NULL; cObject *r=p->obj; p=p->next; return r;}
00107 
00114         cObject *operator--(int)  {if (!p) return NULL; cObject *r=p->obj; p=p->prev; return r;}
00115     };
00116 
00117     friend class Iterator;
00118 
00119   private:
00120     bool tkownership; //FIXME move it info flags
00121     QElem *frontp, *backp;  // inserting at back(), removal at front()
00122     int n;  // number of items in the queue
00123     CompareFunc compare;   // comparison function; NULL for FIFO
00124 
00125   protected:
00126     // internal functions
00127     QElem *find_qelem(cObject *obj) const;
00128     void insbefore_qelem(QElem *p, cObject *obj);
00129     void insafter_qelem(QElem *p, cObject *obj);
00130     cObject *remove_qelem(QElem *p);
00131 
00132   public:
00139     cQueue(const char *name=NULL, CompareFunc cmp=NULL);
00140 
00146     cQueue(const cQueue& queue);
00147 
00151     virtual ~cQueue();
00152 
00160     cQueue& operator=(const cQueue& queue);
00162 
00165 
00171     virtual cQueue *dup() const  {return new cQueue(*this);}
00172 
00177     virtual std::string info() const;
00178 
00183     virtual void forEachChild(cVisitor *v);
00184 
00190     virtual void parsimPack(cCommBuffer *buffer);
00191 
00197     virtual void parsimUnpack(cCommBuffer *buffer);
00199 
00206     virtual void setup(CompareFunc cmp);
00207 
00212     virtual void insert(cObject *obj);
00213 
00219     virtual void insertBefore(cObject *where, cObject *obj);
00220 
00226     virtual void insertAfter(cObject *where, cObject *obj);
00227 
00232     virtual cObject *remove(cObject *obj);
00233 
00238     virtual cObject *pop();
00239 
00244     virtual void clear();
00246 
00254     virtual cObject *front() const;
00255 
00261     virtual cObject *back() const;
00262 
00266     virtual int getLength() const;
00267 
00271     bool isEmpty() const {return getLength()==0;}
00272 
00276     int length() const {return getLength();}
00277 
00281     bool empty() const {return isEmpty();}
00282 
00288     cObject *get(int i) const;
00289 
00293     virtual bool contains(cObject *obj) const;
00295 
00298 
00311     void setTakeOwnership(bool tk) {tkownership=tk;}
00312 
00318     bool getTakeOwnership() const {return tkownership;}
00320 };
